item.title: Jeep Wrangler 4xe Recall Alert: 320,000 Hybrids at Fire Risk – What Trail-Ready Owners Need to Know
item.description: Big recall hits the Jeep Wrangler 4xe – potential battery fire risk has owners parking outside. Here's the rugged truth on your hybrid trail beast.
